entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:21 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:21 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 26.
